alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL BAYFIELD, EAST CENTRAL WASHBURN AND NORTHWESTERN SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayward, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hayward around 605 PM CDT. Little Round Lake around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Round Lake, Seeley and Cable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
